jol.types.operator
Class RemoteBuffer

java.lang.Object
  jol.types.operator.Operator
      jol.types.operator.RemoteBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Operator>
public class RemoteBuffer
extends Operator

A RemoteBuffer takes the input tuples and inserts them into the NetworkBuffer. The operator sends an empty TupleSet to the output.

predicate - The (head) predicate with the remote location attribute.
